Build

  • Download sources.
  • In terminal do:
    1. go to you sources folder;
    2. run npm install;
    3. run bower install;
    4. go to docs folder with command cd docs;
    5. run bower install;
    6. go back to your sources folder by typing cd ..;
    7. run gulp.
  • In you browser go to http://127.0.0.1:3333/
If you want to buld minified sources, in substep 7 run gulp build.
